resources.string: Poketto is the simplest, most secure and near instant way to send money to friends and pay for your every day items.
Poketto uses xDai for near instant transactions to an xDai address. Not sure what xDai is? We will try to explain.
xDai is an Ethereum blockchain that uses USD-stable xDai (a representation of DAI token) as the native coin of the network.
Your xDai wallet will be generated for you as soon as you press get started. You can also import an existing wallet on the settings.
